title: Has Scorched Earth Renekton gone on sale this month
body:
I wanted to get a renekton skin and saw one was on sale this month just wanted to see if it has gone on sale yet ?
Thx

replies.body:
[Surrender@20](http://www.surrenderat20.net/) is a good place to check as they will post the champ/skin sales as the go up (or just check the store every few days).

To answer your question though, no, it does not appear that SE Rene has been on sale this month, so keep an eye out :)
These are the current champions and skins on sale ----->http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-09/02-13/02
